review: Very good value for the price
author: TIM SAYGER

review: works even better then advertised, I'm very happy with it!!!
author: dbill "dbill"

review: The fire stick works better than anticipated. It runs smoothly, simple to use and discreet. If you haven't gotten one yet. You should.
author: John Prislan

review: I can do all that I wanted on my television so well that I don't even bother switching it back to regular cable anymore.
author: Amber

review: Easy to setup and use. Portable. Can take it on the go...I am going to purchase another for the TV upstairs...Very good and affordable. Works best if you add yourself to Amazon Prime. You can't go wrong with the price.
author: Timothy Bannister

review: Yup, this is cool.  It converted my old TV into a smart TV.  The TV can't be too old though, it has to have an HDMI port.  This is way cheaper than buying a new TV and if you're a Prime member, there's lots of free stuff to watch!
author: Athena

review: fantastic,I take on trips and I always have plenty of movies to watch.It reduce the cost of having TV
author: drbob11

review: This was well worth the money.  As a prime member, there are lots of free movies we can watch.
author: Marcia Cantrell
